title: Greater Restoration
text:
You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect. This spell requires diamond dust worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes. You can reduce the target’s exhaustion level by one, or end one of the following effects on the target:
One effect that charmed or petrified the target
One curse, including the target’s attunement to a cursed magic item
Any reduction to one of the target’s ability scores
One effect reducing the target’s hit point maximum
